biocontainers.name: fargene
biocontainers.summary: Fragmented antibiotic resistance gene ienntifier takes either fragmented metagenomic data or longer sequences as input and predicts and delivers full-length antiobiotic resistance genes as output

biotools.summary: fARGene (Fragmented Antibiotic Resistance Gene iENntifiEr ) is a tool that takes either fragmented metagenomic data or longer sequences as input and predicts and delivers full-length antiobiotic resistance genes as output.

galaxy.bio_tools_summary: fARGene (Fragmented Antibiotic Resistance Gene iENntifiEr ) is a tool that takes either fragmented metagenomic data or longer sequences as input and predicts and delivers full-length antiobiotic resistance genes as output.
